titles: The scourge of villanie Three bookes of satyres.
author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] and are to be sold by Iohn Buzbie, in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane,
notes: Foreword signed "VV. Kinsayder"; signed at end "Theriomastix", i.e. John Marston.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
